name: Pacbase: Avoid Programs using C statement
description: The COMPUTE statement rounds up the number to the weakest precision, so nested operations can lead to a false or unprecise result. This statement is also expensive in terms of performance.
output: Nb of batch programs using Compute`!xA!`Value: nb of COMPUTE per program
rationale: The COMPUTE statement rounds up the number to the weakest precision, so nested operations can lead to a false or unprecise result. This statement is also expensive in terms of performance.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
